CustomField.description: This field is for Admin use only, not meant to be edited by other users. Will be pivotal in integrating with Highline and AD
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is for Admin use only, not meant to be edited by other users. Will be pivotal in integrating with Highline and AD. The integration should provide a text value which can be used to identify a record in external systems (HL & AD) uniquely
CustomField.label: External Id
